page.title: 10Employment.
page.content: In this strongly agricultural area, the 17 farms named provide employment for some of the population in the many rural communities. Powick Hospital,run by the NHS to treat people with mental illnesses, is the major employer for local villagers and people from nearby towns. However,most people commute each day from their homes in Callow End,Powick, Collett's Green and Bowling Green to work or school in Worcester or Malvern,or further afield in towns along the M5. The larger dormitory settlements are characterised by a mixture of old traditional buildings of local materials, and new private and council housing estates.
